entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 12:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -43.2°C
Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
